website_summaries.verdict: One of the smoothest, best-tasting protein powders on the market with 14 delicious flavors to choose from.
pros: Smooth consistency that's not too watery or too gritty
Mixes well without the need for a blender
cons: Keeps sugar content down by using artificial sweeteners
Expensive for how many servings you get

customer_reviews.title: Found a bug in the protein bottle
customer_reviews.text: I found a bug is this protein powder today. Can't belived that I have drink half of the cask. I will not purchase this product agian and I am going to report this to USDA.
customer_reviews.author: Junyu peng

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste, new problem.
customer_reviews.text: Tasted way off, like some sort of chemical . Terrible after taste . Long time user of BSN products. Ordered from another site, same issue. It not because of Amazon, it is a BSN issue. Avoid until the chemical after taste is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Derick Wildstar

customer_reviews.title: New formula? Tastes off
customer_reviews.text: They must have changed the formula with the new labels because I just got my shipment today and it tastes much worse. It isn't disgusting but there is a definite difference in taste, I bought this brand because it tasted better so much better than everything else. Guess I will have to start looking for a new powder.
customer_reviews.author: Zane martin

customer_reviews.title: Beware ...... change in net carbs!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordinarily love this product however after getting in a new shipment I looked more closely because they’ve recently changed the bottles look, only to discover that they’ve changed the nutritional information (see photo comparing older version with new).It appears it now has one additional gram of sugar and four fewer grams of fiber, increasing its net carbs to 14 from 10 which is minor I admit but when your living on less than 50 carbs a day it’s significant. I enjoyed this product immensely from its taste to it’s mix ability. I’ll keep on the lookout for future versions so I can purchase again if they return to the original formula.
customer_reviews.author: Boberto

customer_reviews.title: Suspect ingredients and bad taste.
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken more time to do research on this product. Some of the ingredients are from countries like China. In fact I would bet they don't even know where some of the ingredients are from. Unfortunately I based my purchase off of one blog that rated it high. Not only are the ingredients suspect but it has an awful taste. Stay away from this one, there is a reason why it's so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Douglas T Harrison

customer_reviews.title: STOP CHEAPENING THE FORMULA. SOON IT WILL TASTE LIKE PURE TOOTHPASTE.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this strawberry milkshake flavor protein for a long time, and every few months it seems to taste more and more like toothpaste. I know it's not in my head because other people are saying the same thing. It used to taste and have a texture like strawberry poundcake crumbled into milk. Now the clumps don't crumble like that and taste like globs of toothpaste. Please return the formula to how it was one or two years ago. I can bet it costs a little bit less to make with the current formula, but I can also bet you are losing customers, because we DO notice the taste changing.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone way down hill!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great, and I’ve purchased this product dozens of times. However the last three orders have had issues. Time to find a new co-packer. Go back to Genysis or Aspen Copak. I’ve found plastic in it twice. And the last order was missing the seal in the lid and the seal around the lid. I threw that one out.
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Only Review you’ll need to read.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for 5 years now and they have a consistent great taste my go to is chocolate but even when I get tired of it strawberry is right there to switch it up for me. It’s easy to mix no large chunks of protien left in your shaker. I lift 7 days a week and I need something to look forward to at the end of my work out. I bought cheaper protiens before they just weren’t worth it. No nasty protien farts from this one for me that was a problem with cheaper products.
customer_reviews.author: The Griblet

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was one of the more highly rated flavors of protein powder out there. Those ratings were right -- this stuff tastes amazing with (almond) milk. You still know you're drinking protein powder if you drink it with no other add-ins, but it's not gross like many other powders. I can't speak to what kind of results it gives because I'm unfortunately inconsistent with drinking it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Thode

customer_reviews.title: Stay in school kids - Use this mathematical equation to measure quality of protein powders
customer_reviews.text: According to a lot of fitness YouTube channels, if a protein powder gives you diarrhea its an indication that it perhaps has some low quality ingredients. Please take the amount of protein and divide that by the serving and if the number you get is above 80% it means it a good product (bc it has at least 80%) protein in there anything less and that means the company is fooling you by throwing garbage ingredients in there such as maltodextrin (which is basically sugar and other ingredients) stay in school kids.
customer_reviews.author: BestBuy

customer_reviews.title: I love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Ok... so I'm chubby and tiny, meaning that I need protein powder that is meant for weight loss for tiny people. The calories in one scoop are only 200 calories! Me being chubby, I can honestly say that protein drinks suck. They don't taste good. This one does. I'm not getting paid for this review, I just want to help other people like me who were looking for a supplement to help their workouts. SOOO... what I do to make it more bearable, is a bought a personal blender thing. I put ice, water, bananas, peanut butter, and the chocolate protein powder. I blend it and it tastes delicious! Try it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Might work, but terrible taste.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands and types of protein powders. I thought that I was getting a different flavor, but somehow I accidentally ordered the milk chocolate. First, I had problems with it still clumping, even in a blender bottle, it has more calories than most others because of the added fat, and the taste...AWFUL! Basic chocolates are usually an easy "go-to" choice, but this was garbage. I have even tried mixing it with other flavors, adding peanut butter, chocolate milk, and there is just something amuck about it. I wouldn't take it if it was free.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Smith

customer_reviews.title: YUCK! HORRIBLE STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: This powder is just plain awful! It doesn't mix well, stays granular and clumped and has a very chalky taste! YUCK! There are MUCH better products to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: Diane C. Lytwyn

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter Cookie
customer_reviews.text: While this is a step-up from Body Fortress and Nitro Tech in terms of quality, texture, and taste I find this flavor is lacking when compared to the Chocolate flavor offered by SYNTHA-6. I look forward to trying more of this excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great! Makes me feel great!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great so it's not it such a chore taking in your protein. I take it first thing in the morning and right after a workout, times when you need immediate protein! Been using it consistently for the last 3 years and never even thought of switching to another brand. We can't eat steaks all the time so make sure you have your supplements in between meals and make sure you get one that actually tastes good!
customer_reviews.author: The Toan Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and good results.
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting and easy to mix protein powder. I mix it with 8oz of water and it tastes very much like a chocolate shake. After about a week, I noticed an increase in my strength (I also starting using creative at the same time, so it could be that), and started bulking up more. I feel like it also helped with my muscle recovery, since I was sore for a couple days longer before using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Alanis

customer_reviews.title: Unique Blend of Protein
customer_reviews.text: I've taken Syntha-6 on and off over the years. I haven't tried the other flavors because the Strawberry flavor is really good and I just stick with that. Pretty smooth after mixing in a shaker. Nice blend of protein that caters to slow and fast digestion. The cholesterol level in a serving is the only negative thing that seems to be a little high, but I imagine a healthy adult who's not taking massive amount of this protein daily would be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sherk

customer_reviews.title: tastes good and I think it really works
customer_reviews.text: I add it to my breakfast veggie fruit smoothie to help make it more sustenant so it keeps me full until lunch. Nice chocolate flavor and it mixes well with frozen fruit and vegetables and just a little water. Not gritty at all. I think it's actually helped me build lean muscle since it's the only thing I've introduced into my exercise routine and diet and I've noticed I feel better and have good muscle development. I like it a lot! I always get more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: BEST DAMN FLAVOR!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I must admit, I originally got this since I started going to the gym with my sister and I wanted something to help me build muscle. I read the comments that the "strawberry milkshake" flavor tasted like heaven and it does! I recently stopped going to the gym because of school, but I still drink this (even though I shouldn't) with smoothies or just plain low fat milk. Buy this. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Taste! FIND THE SCOOP**
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes so good it's hard not to drink it when you haven't worked out. I prefer to blend mine up for the smoothest quality. I will say, don't make the mistake I made and try to make your own portions. When I first opened mine the cup for scoops had been submerged under the powder and I had a tough time figuring out the right portion size until I found the scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: Deception
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the powder is good. But then again, if you use any protein powder and workout/eat properly, you’ll see good results. The biggest let down I had with this was the FLAVOR. All the people who said the flavor was amazing must’ve been high. I ordered the cookies and cream because surprisingly it had less sugar than the vanilla, plus why not. If cookies n cream in ur mind taste like sugar and milk-water, this is def the flavor you want. (Can’t speak to other flavors.) P.S- the scooper is prob towards the bottom of the container. (Gives the appearance that there’s more powder than there actually is.)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Far better than I was expecting it to be.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have normally been buying chocolete Whey powder and it only ever tasted good in milk. This water tastes fantastic in water. This is exactly what I was looking for. I have been drinking it now for a couple of weaks and I feel like it gives me energy. I am not very hungry after I wake up and uually hve to wait for a couple hours before I am able to eat anything. However I drink this protein mix instead and have no stomach problems after wards and I end up feeling energized for my day.
customer_reviews.author: SonGokuTheWarrior

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT GARBAGE TASTE
customer_reviews.text: Amazing powder, lots of protein and calories (if that's something you want) but god damn it tastes AWFUL. They have another product that is a Coldstone collaboration that I highly recommend you check out.
customer_reviews.author: Farah

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is everything
customer_reviews.text: I find flavor an issue with protein powders... no doubt, for me, the strawberry one is great mixed with milk and over three months still appealing. So I continue at least daily. I find skin, ligaments and muscle strength improved comparing trainer led muscle strengthening over three months, say, before and after while overall weight unchanged.
customer_reviews.author: Dr K.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Not Sealed, Contents Leaked Everwhere
customer_reviews.text: BSN SYNTHA-6 is great tasting stuff; however, I was very frustrated to receive my bottle only to discover that the top was not tightly screwed on, and there was strawberry protein powder all throughout my Amazon box. I STRONGLY recommend that the manufacturer add a glued foil seal at the very top of each jar, then have the screw on cap, then have the plastic wrapped around that. My bottle was exposed to air (and potential contamination) as well as gave me a mess to clean up. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, mixes well, worth a try if you're okay with sucralose and acesulfame potassium.
customer_reviews.text: The Peanut Butter tastes good. I normally do chocolate in protein powders but a review mentioned the PB as being good and so I tried it. The powder also mixes pretty well. The con for me, which I was a little concerned about, is that I'm not a big fan of artificial sweeteners in anything. The reviews on this product are good and so I thought I'd give it a shot; but the artificial sweeteners just don't jive the best in my system. I am trying Vintage Braun - with mulitple protein sources - now as well. But I have to say, I am finding whey only powders wotk the best for me, pre- and post-workout, as well as pre-bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Maryland1

customer_reviews.title: PROTEIN POWDER WASN'T SEALED. UNSAFE!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to taste this protein powder yet because i don't know if it's safe due to it NOT being sealed. All the other supplements i ordered came in sealed. The protein powder did not. I really needed this powder to start my training for my competition and now I have to be inconvenienced. I really hated to give it stars because I haven't tasted it yet but this app made me rate it.
customer_reviews.author: Tino

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Protein
customer_reviews.text: I have a sensitive stomach and I've tried a lot of proteins but they all caused more issues than they were worth. This one works well, has helped put on muscle, mixes SO WELL (it's crazy, just shake and you're good to go) and it tastes pretty good as well. The first day or two I had an upset stomach but then it settled and now this works perfectly. Strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel BosticTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and product in general.
customer_reviews.text: I’m super picky about flavors and I have a lot of stomach issues. This has been an amazing product. It’s smooth and the flavor doesn’t taste fake. I use it as a meal replacement and it definitely fills both myself and my husband up. Has been great during these scary times with the COVID-19 too when we weren’t sure about stores closing and having enough food. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bruno

customer_reviews.title: not so sweet, a little airborne dust, just small lumps, little foam with water shake.
customer_reviews.text: not so sweet, a little airborne dust, just small lumps, little foam with water shake. Chocolate milkshake taste is fine, again not so sweet as MET-RX 100%-whey chocolate for example. I don't like the relatively high carbs in this blend. I do like this whey-casein "matrix"/blend for a slower-digesting protein snack, slower than my typical 100%-whey. This does not clump like 100%-casein, at all - that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: Amazing taste!!! Taste like an actual milkshake. I blend this with milk, along with other ingredients like banana and it comes out so thick and velvety. I recommend this. Great value for 5 lbs. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the container is so big for what it has inside. On the other hand, the "Chocolate Milkshake" flavor is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Give me all the cookies!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely ordering this again! For the one time purchase this product was about $40 for 5lbs - amazing! Then to have it be a BSN brand and cookies n cream flavor - double amazing! The flavor is so good and it blends well with cold liquids. My favorite recipe I've made with it is blending ; ice, frozen bananas, almond milk, and two scoops of cookies n cream protein powder - the less almond milk you add the thicker it will be - it ends up tasting like ice cream! Buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for different flavored protein powders. This isn't very good. When you open the container it smells bad. I think that's why i didn't like the flavor. I even mixed half of this one with another brand's chocolate and it was still ucky. I'm glad it was only $20.00.
customer_reviews.author: Loni Oates

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Best flavor and results!
customer_reviews.text: Strawberry flavor is so tasty, I add extra frozen ones and blueberries and banana for best flavor, with low fat milk and ice. Amazing price I’ve made so many 12oz cups. I’m a bit more than half way through it and have made well over 25 cups. When you spend 8$ on the same 12oz outside (and less delicious). It sounds like a scam, but without thinking anything of it, I got bigger faster ever since I started drinking these after exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo G

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting Protein Powder on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is ridiculously delicious. I actually crave it, and I used to hate drinking protein shakes because they all tasted terrible. I like the strawberry the best for sure. It runs a little high on calories so if you're looking for something a little less caloric, then Synta-6 Edge would be the best bet for you. It tastes exactly the same, and I cannot tell a difference. This is also great for those who are trying to bulk up.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protien powder.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I make a daily shake with this powder. We mix spinach,blueberries and almond milk. This is the best tasting protien powder that i have found, a great way to introduce protien instead of eating to much meat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep Expectations Realistic
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of the two flavors I ordered and I find it to be the most palatable. It is quite sweet and works for me. The shakes come out rather thick with milk and a bit thinner with water. If you're looking for something with good strawberry flavor this will work. Note that this is a good healthy replacement for the flavor it copies. If you go in expecting this to taste exactly like a milkshake you're going to have a bad time. Overall, a great flavor but could use some improvements. Want a more strawberry flavor rather than milk flavor in this.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: A Disgusting Shift: From Very Good to Vomit
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Syntha-6 Peanut Butter Cookie for over three years now. Normally, it is delicious and I look forward to drinking it. However, I either got an expired batch or they recently changed their formula. The latest tub I got smelled disgusting and tasted dreadful, almost like mildew. After changing my bottle and my water in hopes they were the causes, I still cannot get this shake down without gagging. I have decided to shift to a different brand to try and find one that tastes as good as Syntha 6 used to taste.
customer_reviews.author: K Mack

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand and a lot of their different products, ALL THE TIME. I love this flavor in particular. So rich and delicious. German chocolate is my favorite, as well as my fathers. I ended up sending him this and got him hooked too!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F

customer_reviews.title: Good... but too much cholesterol
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is above average, and the powder blends well. I mix 2 scoops with ice, 2 cups of non-fat milk, and a tablespoon of peanut butter in the blender post-workout. It makes a delicious shake. But the amount of cholesterol per serving is obscene. For me, the cholesterol was high enough that I've switched to another brand of protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R. Lainhart

customer_reviews.title: Taste is phenomenal
customer_reviews.text: YUM!! I took a break from this brand for awhile and just tried the new (to me) peanut butter cookie flavor, and WOW, it’s delicious! And so much protein packed into such a small portion. The flavor is outstanding and the value for what you pay is excellent. I will continue to order this kind! Mix with milk for the best taste ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jess A

customer_reviews.title: Once you go Syntha, you wont go back
customer_reviews.text: I have used powders for nearly 20 years now. - The Syntha-6 protein powders are simply the best tasting and most easily water resolving powders that i have ever used. I recently ran out of a 5 pounder of this tasty goodness and decided that I wanted some protein powder without waiting that 2-7 days for shipping again; just to tide me over. Bought a popular brand that sounded good/good reviews online and so grabbed a couple pounds of another brands, cookies and cream. ...... I quickly went back online and bought another tub of this chocolate stuff. I have to try banana next. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Gives me digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: There is a sensitivity filter that is keeping my review of the product out of public view. 3 stars! I like the product but I perfer a different protein The price is better and the digestive enzymes in there helps. I have digestive issues with this protein. Tastes great, but i get to launch off my toilet like a rocket into space 3 times a day.
customer_reviews.author: KenGsaur

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I bought Syntha-6 from here and not anywhere else only because they are claiming that they provide the 10 lbs in the new pacakge and on receiving the shipment, it turned to to be the old Syntha-6 package which left me very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Islam

customer_reviews.title: Container is only filled a little over half way
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this several times but this last time I purchased the larger container. When it arrived the my husband pointed out that the contents were almost half empty!! Its powder, there is no reason why the container isnt full. This is a sealed container so no, nothing has leaked out. Its a waste of packaging and you dont get the amount you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein powder!
customer_reviews.text: I like the Syntha-6 protein powders after a workout. So far all of the flavors I've tried have been really tasty and mix well. I use unsweetend almond milk to mix my shakes, and I feel that with the carbs and protein in one scoop, I get what my muscles need to recover. The strawberry milkshake flavor doesn't taste medicinal like some berry protein powders I've tried in the past. Will definitely be buying regularly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Powder
customer_reviews.text: Not only did this product come in speedy (even amidst the coronavirus pandemic- it only took 2 days!) but it's the best protein powder I've ever tried. My previous powder never mixed thoroughly, sometimes had an off-putting smell, and settled too quickly after being mixed in with my almond milk. I have no such problems with this! I shaked my shaker bottle for about half the time I would with the previous brand and no chunks! Tastes great too. Haven't dug deep into the ingredient label yet, but it's whey and contains egg so obviously it's not vegan friendly if that's your thing. Otherwise- would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the larger size????
customer_reviews.text: I use this protein powder daily and have for years. I've always been happy with the taste of the chocolate milkshake. It doesn't taste gritty at all. I used to buy the 48 servings size, which is the largest I've seen other than the bag that is $80. I can't find the 48 serving size anymore!!! It costs more for me to purchase two of the 28 serving size so I won't do that. PLEASE bring back the 48 serving size!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey V.

customer_reviews.title: BEST FLIPPIN PROTEIN POWDER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Protein powder, I’ve been drinking protein for years and this legit tastes like I took Betty Crocker battery and poured it in the cup and added alittle bit of water and drank it. Sweet and best tasting by far. I would give 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: E Presta

customer_reviews.title: This stuff tastes amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of buying protein shakes for breakfast and thought I'd try this out. It tastes amazing. I read somewhere that there is a bodybuilder that said he spent over $20k on this stuff and after trying it, I believe him.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: BEST TASTING BY FAR
customer_reviews.text: If you like peanut butter cookies, THIS IS FOR YOU! Tastes like a Cold Stone shake. I look forward to it every day. Feel great the next day, notices a better recovery on this protein compared to ON whey. Does give you a decently thick shake-like drink, so ALWAYS add the powder to water. If you add water to the powder, you'll get some major clumping. No shaker ball needed if you add powder to the water, mixes very well then. Rinse ASAP for easiest rinsing!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: If corn syruls doeant bother you, this is good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it without reading the ingredients. It has corn syrup solids, it's not a bad thing if you drink this once every three days or so, but I wouldn't recommend eating corn syrups, high fructose corn syrups, or corn syrup solids. You can go buy other products like the Isolate version which doesn't have it, it costs more but it's a better choice overall. It does have a good amount of protein, taste great, but won't be buying this protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Ikillgummybears

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I drink this after my workouts and I love the strawberry flavor! I want to try the cookies n cream one next. I put a half scoop less than what is recommended because I put some peanut butter protein in my shake too. I got the big size one because I felt it was worth the money compared to the smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: jensintoacid

customer_reviews.title: tastes terrible
customer_reviews.text: Quality protein, I presume, but my Chocolate Milkshake tastes like a cat had a bowel movement in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Suter

customer_reviews.title: best taste, but not enough protein
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Best taste ever have! The first protein powder I tried was muscle tech, it was too sweet and also bad quality. Then I used to buy optrium double rich Chocolate and casein, which I thought was best, but I decided to make some change this time. So I get this, and the flavor is really great! Cons: 22 g protein / scoop, less than OP. Also contains egg protein, which is cheap and hard to absorb. Overview: 4 star
customer_reviews.author: GustavoWang

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I bought the chocolate milkshake flavor and truly tastes like a chocolate milkshake! Doesn't taste like a bunch of chemicals. I either mix it with milk or blend it with peanut butter and a banana. I used Optimum Nutrition Whey for years and I started getting stomachaches from it, but I haven't had a problem with this protein.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and great taste
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Syntha-6 fan for over a year now. Their protein mixes well and tastes great without a lot of added sugar. Chocolate Milkshake and Cake Batter flavors taste great. I've also had their Cookies and Cream but didn't enjoy it because the tiny cookie bits are rough feeling, sink to the bottom and are not comfortable to drink. Will continue to stay stocked with their protein
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Will not blend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using BSN's protein powder for about a year now. Have probably gone through 12 - 16 large bottles. I like the taste and it has always blended relatively well. The bottle I just purchased WILL NOT blend. I use a blender bottle and/or just a spoon to mix and both have always worked but this time it's markedly different. I'm hoping they haven't changed the formula. Unsure if I should buy again. I would prefer to stay with this product but won't if something has changed. Wondering if anyone else has had the same issue? Could it be a bad batch?
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Works very well if you're trying to lean out
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this brand of protein powder for about 3 months and I've been enjoying it so far. These past months I've been noticing my body leaning out and increasing how visible all the veins in my body look even on my abs. I've taken many other supplements and this by far is the best tasting one. Would definitely recommend especially if you're ordering on Amazon since it is cheaper than buying it at an actual store in person.
customer_reviews.author: Madskillz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but pick your flavor wisely
customer_reviews.text: I'm not big into weightlifting or anything like that. I'm more on the slender side and was looking for a good source of protein to help my body rebuild after physical therapy. The Syntha-6 fits the bill, helping me to recover and tasting delicious in the process. The first jug we bought was the Vanilla Ice Cream, which I would rate five stars. We got the Cookies and Cream the second time around and it's just not nearly as good. It tastes a bit funny (artificial?), though it is still enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G.

customer_reviews.title: good but should not be your main protein source
customer_reviews.text: tast good but being educated in fitness the 5 protein blends aren't the best for getting the protein right to the muscle but still is a good buy and protein just wouldn't have just thing in my arsenal
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: My go-to!
customer_reviews.text: This is my all-time favorite protein powder. I've tried other flavors from both this brand and others, and the chocolate milkshake is the absolute best. It's easy to mix with my almond milk and also easy to digest. I drink it with almond milk usually, but sometimes I'll make shakes with pb2 powder and banana.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey R.

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tasting protein mixes I have had. Very very little after-taste and actually tastes like the flavor you buy. I've had the strawberry (favorite), chocolate and cookies n cream.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miltimore

customer_reviews.title: but they drag some of their horrible flavors under that umbrella at times too
customer_reviews.text: Still on the expensive side compared to what else is out there. Syntha 6 has gotten a name for the quality and flavor, but they drag some of their horrible flavors under that umbrella at times too. You pretty much need to just get their variations of chocolate flavors unless you have already developed a taste for some of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Brent C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing protein powder, the best !
customer_reviews.text: Syntha 6 is the best protein powder out there. Used it for years when I had an intense workout routine. I now use it in my breakfast shake to keep my weight regular, vanilla is the best !
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, didn't realize the protein was derived from such poor and cheaply made ingredients (my opinion). It didn't settle well with anyone's stomach that used it in my house. My advice buy something from 5% the egg white crystal was awesome (that was my replacement) or MLS nutrition. Just look into a "good deal" before you buy, that was my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing protein.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product. I have a shake every morning for breakfast. Gives me good energy till lunch and helps with the energy for my lunch time gym stop. I lost 40 lbs using this as breakfast instead of skipping it. All of the flavors are great tasting as well.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Green

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Way Superior to Any Other Brands We Tried
customer_reviews.text: First of all, we love the taste. We tried Muscle Milk and few other brands before, but, this is definitely a keeper. The texture is perfect. This is how we make ours. We mix in one scoop (in fact, we don't fill the scoop all the way, the drink becomes too thick otherwise) of powder with about 6 oz of fat free milk. This powder mixes well if the milk is lukewarm. We then stir it well. The texture improves dramatically if you let it stand for about 5 minutes before consumption. I don't think we are going to switch to any other brand anytime soon :)
customer_reviews.author: Azom S.

customer_reviews.title: The taste is great and doesnt clump up if you use milk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for the 6 different high quality protein blends, you can't go wrong with fast and slow acting proteins in each scoop. The taste is great and doesnt clump up if you use milk. This is a staple supplement in my supplementation of weightlifting products. Great for pre and post workout. Also great for recovery if you go to the gym almost everyday or meal replacement when you miss a meal.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: For a protein powder, this stuff tastes about as good as its going to get. I have tried most of the flavors but find myself returning to the strawberry. It mixes very well, gives you a nice creamy yet; not thick, consistency. It does contain a few more carbs than I typically would like but over all, its a great protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Jake K

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein period
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting protein period! Great for building muscle with the extra calories. This protein may only show 22 grams of protein per scoop but independent labs have shown that it is closers to 24 and is much higher then other company's who claim 26 but really only have 18 or 20. They do not spike their protein. They owned by On Nutrition, the most trusted company in sport nutrition. They own their own dairy farms in the states and have full control of the product. They do not import thier protein from outside of America like many other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well and tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I mix my shakes with naked pb, milk, ice, and strawberry syrup. This powder mixes well in my blender although I've never tired to mix it in a shaker. The flavor is great. My only complaint is that it has 200 calories per serving when other brands only have 120 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Ray N

customer_reviews.title: Diabetic tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: I am diabetic and need some carbs, but not a lot. This is a good balance. It keeps me running but doesn't make me fat. And the best part it tastes good and disperses easily; sometimes I forget the shaker ball, but the shake mixed without extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Food is always better
customer_reviews.text: Needed to lose weight after my surgery at the the time had better ingredients then I was consuming thru out the day.used it as a meal replacement for breakfast. When I started I was at 232 about 4 months later down to 194. You have to be active and have a goal in mind otherwise your wasting money. This is a good product if you know what your doing.
customer_reviews.author: stevey

customer_reviews.title: I love this protein and tastes awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste of this stuff when used in a power blender. I mix with milk about 8-9 oz to a scoop and usually do around 20 oz with 2 heaping scoops in my blender. Adds about 20 grams of protein to my intake and I swear is probably the closest thing to a real milkshake that you can get without using ice cream! Not everyone likes this because it's not "clean" protein but unless you are cutting for competition it's just fine and provides lots of supplements along with protein. Give it to your skinny teenage boys that can't gain weight, they'll love it too! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Moto Man

customer_reviews.title: bad batch of whey
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this product for years but this last batch did not have some QC done or something. It tasted absolutely terrible, like a cross between topsoil and pennies. Shame to throw away 10 pounds of whey but it’s bad enough to not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: neil b.

customer_reviews.title: Answer for Recovery
customer_reviews.text: I am in my mid-fifties and sustain an active workout mix between weights, cycling, stretching and yoga. I have enjoyed this product for years and have really seen the benefits when it comes to recovery. Back to back to back hard group rides were becoming a grind until one of my buddies clued me in on SYNTHA-6. After about three weeks of taking the product I could really feel the difference by enjoying a fast bounce back between workout sessions. I now get the full benefit of being able to come into a workout feeling energetic and ready for a challenge. Plus the stuff tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Crunchworm

customer_reviews.title: Man the flavor of this stuff is awesome. Chocolate Milkshake is the best
customer_reviews.text: Man the flavor of this stuff is awesome. Chocolate Milkshake is the best. Tastes like a legit milkshake and mixed well with water in a shaker bottle. Check the macros, you are getting some sugars, carbs, etc in addition to the protein. I’m a lean guy and looking to add a few pounds so works for me. If you are trying to cut weight I would look elsewhere, for something that’s cleaner protein (but won’t taste as good).
customer_reviews.author: B. Taniguchi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protein Value
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a XPI Myotein for a while but it's fairly pricey; Syntha-6 has a great reputation so I decided to give it a try. The bottom line is, this is a great tasting and high performance protein shake. It'll definitely give you the muscle gains and fat burn you want, which happens to be a lot, but I notice my muscles don't feel as fully recovered and are a bit more sore the next day when compared to Myotein. On the up side, I do think it helps burn more fat than other powders which focus solely on muscle gains. Basically, this is a great value protein shake with very high performance results. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mu

customer_reviews.title: price
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand but always found it too expensive. Lately though it is the same price or CHEAPER than can be bought at a regular store. The empty container is excellent for storing other dry food items afterward.
customer_reviews.author: ikepono

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good product, but the taste...
customer_reviews.text: I wish this powder came in like a single packet because I would have bought that. I mixed this with milk to try it out, but I couldn't finish my serving. I realize taste buds are different for everyone, but with this mine said, "no thank you."
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cant get iced cream delivery? This tastes like an ice cream milkshake
customer_reviews.text: Mix this with ice, frozen banana pieces, milk, and a splash of vanilla coffee creamer ( or half and half) and you will think you are drinking a chocolate banana shake.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Blends well, good product and good value
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and reordered this product numerous times. I usually drink one or two a day. It is just filling enough - not too rich but not too thin. The flavor is good although I will get sick of it and rotate b/w chocolate and vanilla. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A

customer_reviews.title: Best Chocolate Protein Powder ever!
customer_reviews.text: After muscling down protein powder after protein powder, we finally found this brand and will never go anywhere else! The flavor is amazing, mixes perfectly without a shaker ball, delicious in water, amazing in milk! All 4 of my kids love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Parsons

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein is Intek Evolution
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky when it comes to proteins. I have been in the fitness industry for quite a few years now and have tried many different protein. My favorite protein is Intek Evolution, however, since I moved away from home it is hard for me to get my hands on because the nutrition stores where I am at now do not sell it. I did some reading on Syntha and it seemed very comparable. I received my order in a timely manner, and it tastes really good. Not too sweet, not chalky, and blends extremely awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very good, lower calorie whey and casien supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Syntha 6 has been one of the top protein supplements for years and is still on top. I have actually had good results with all BSN products. This is probably one of the best tasting of all whey products, and it yields good results and shortens my recovery time as good or better than any other. Another product that I had good gains with is the Muscle Pharm Combat Powder, but it tastes like it has lots of sugar in it. Syntha 6 tastes great and is a lower calorie gainer that works and tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Taste/flavor has been changed.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using BSN protein ( Milkshake) for almost 3 years , it was my favorite protein but I recently noticed that the taste of Milkshake has changed ( now it's awful). Time to find something new.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had a protein powder that tasted this good. I’ve been making protein bars out of them and they’re unreal! I can’t speak as to the healthiness of this protein, because as a wise man once told me “If it tastes like birthday cake, but there are no ingredients of a birthday cake in it, then it probably isn’t good for you.” I can agree with that, there are healthier unflavored protein powders, but if you’re only looking for taste and performance (which is me right now) then you will like this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this product before from a different seller and this product is great from this seller too. The only thing is, I'm not sure if it was supposed to come with a scoop but if so, I still haven't found it and I'm about 1/4 to 1/3 of the way through it. I had the scoop from my previous item, but if I did not that could be an issue
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Burke

customer_reviews.title: Solid product and great taste
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of if not the best tasting protein powder on the market. Fairly priced too, however the ingredient list is lacking compared to a few other brands. However, I still keep a jug because it’s the best tasting chocolate flavor and I alternate between flavors every other day or so.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Tastes and mixes about as well as just about any other powder I've had
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the better tasting and easier mixing powders I've had. Knocked one star off because the bag ripped partially very soon after I got it even though all I was doing was just opening and closing it and not even lifting it off the table it sits on.
customer_reviews.author: Jae Rhee

customer_reviews.title: Best Tasting protein shake I’ve ever had!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the taste & quality!! I’m very picky with the flavor of protein shakes since a lot of them taste disgusting, BUT this one tastes AMAZING and I’m definitely going to keep my buying this brand!!! I highly recommend it to any who is looking for great quality protein shake that ACTUALLY TASTES GOOOOOOD!!!!! Btw I bought the chocolate flavor
customer_reviews.author: AKSlaw

customer_reviews.title: Never take more than 50 g's of protein at one time or your body is going to excrete it. Trust me, I have a bachelor's in nutrion
customer_reviews.text: Taste is amazing, very good amino acid chain, I love that it comes in a 5lb tub and the price is unbeatable compared to any retail store especially like Vitamin Shoppe and GNC! The reason why I didn't give it 5 stars, too much fat. Now, the fact that they put in there is good fat that your body needs, but it's a little bit too High
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I add unsweetened almond milk and it’s delicious! I could never actually drink any other protein bc they tasted so bad. I really enjoy this and recommend it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: B Farrish

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein I've Used
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say besides that it is good quality, mixes well, and is very easy to drink. Great flavor. I mix it with water or almond milk, tastes good in either one!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stoobs

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate milkshake is the best
customer_reviews.text: I liked this chocolate milkshake flavor the best of the flavors I’ve tried thus far. This one blends the easiest with either milk or water and tastes the way a milkshake tastes. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best tasting protein powder I have tried to date
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tasting protein powder I have tried to date. Another reviewer was talking about "fillers" that add to the actual protein per scoop count. If you do some research almost all protein powders have added amino acids that add to the protein count. I honestly don't mind because it tastes so good. I'll give up a few grams per scoop for a better taste. It mixes very easily is a very decent price for 5 pounds. This is my 3rd container....will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzle

customer_reviews.title: The Best Thing About Syntha-6 is the Taste
customer_reviews.text: Great taste is the main reason I use Syntha-6. Decent bang-for-your-buck. Doesn't have a ton of protein per scoop and there are plenty of additives (which might be why it tastes so good). I wouldn't make this your main protein, but if you're looking to bulk up or get a break from some of the other chocolate flavors out there, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron C.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in our fam liked this flavor, the birthday cake one not so much. We mix this in our Ninja blender accessory cup with ice, unsweetened almond milk and it taste pretty good and makes you feel somewhat like you're drinking a shake. I'm not too fond of these drinks in the shaker cup, so if you are new to this, invest in a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Tasted So Far
customer_reviews.text: I've used their other products before so I decided to try this one. Never tried strawberry flavoring in any product, but I went for it because I saw all the positive reviews. the flavor did not disappoint. Mixes extremely easily in water. Mixing with milk takes some effort, but tastes way better with it. Tastes like strawberry shortcake ice cream to me, so I can drink it casually, and not have to chug it like I had to with other brands.
customer_reviews.author: D. T.

product_meta.title: BSN SYNTHA-6 Whey Protein Powder, Micellar Casein, Milk Protein Isolate, Chocolate Milkshake, 48 Servings (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Chocolate Milkshake| Size:48 ServingsSyntha-6 is an ultra-premium protein powder with 22g protein per serving and is bsn's best-tasting protein on the market. Syntha-6 is the go-to protein for any nutrition or exercise regimen because it is designed to suit a variety of active lifestyles and diet plans. And with syntha-6, the high standard of quality protein comes with taste to match, thanks to bsn's exclusive flavor technology
feature_bullets: Ridiculously delicious : BSN broke through the whey protein flavor barrier once and for all with the introduction of syntha-6
22 gram protein matrix : Consisting of whey protein concentrate, whey protein isolate, calcium caseinate, micellar casein, milk protein isolate, and egg albumin
2-3 gram sugar : While the taste is mind blowing, syntha-6 contains 2-3 gram of sugar per serving depending on flavor
Use any time of day : Post workout, between meals, as a snack, or as a treat, it doesn’t matter. BSN syntha-6 was formulated to be your any time of day protein powder
Protein supplementation : Promotes muscle protein synthesis and recovery support

specifications.Department: GNC|ALL|ALL|PWD DIET W MILK NUT FACT
